nodes.text: Steam is an online video game delivery system for personal computers. Created by Valve Corporation to distribute its games, patches, and updates, it went online on September 12, 2003. Starting with Strategy First in December, 2005, Valve has partnered with other companies to allow them to release their products on Steam as well. LucasArts announced it would be partnering with Steam on July 6, 2009, and made its first games available there on July 8, 2009. The following Star Wars games have been released on Steam so far:
List of Star Wars games on Steam
